Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Logic.Utils

  • public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    The final Utils class contains methods used by other classes in the project to reduce redundancy.

      • hashImage

        public static java.lang.String hashImage​(java.io.File image)

        Returns:
        the key hashed from the image.
